quotes.text: When you change your energy, you change your life. When you change your life, you change the world.
quotes.context: On the power of personal transformation

quotes.text: The moment you start feeling, you start healing.
Meditation is not about becoming a different person. It's about training in awareness and getting a healthy sense of perspective.
quotes.context: On the purpose of meditation practice

quotes.text: When a community comes together with a common intention, the field becomes coherent.
quotes.context: On the power of collective consciousness
